mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_CREATE_DATE,A.BOARD_HIT, A.IP, GUBUN FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_HIT, IP, GUBUN FROM BOARD) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
